name: Block Busters - Gem of Arena
description:
It is a real-time multiplayer block breaking versus game you can enjoy with players from all over the world. You can make friends and play PVP multiplayer, or even engage in team matches! Collect various skill cards to use in the game. You can upgrade your skill cards to make them much stronger.

Block Busters is free to download & play. However, some in game items are in-app purchases (IAP). Also, you need internet access to play the game.

Descriptions
- Shoot Cannon balls to break blocks and compete with users worldwide in real-time.
- Open card packs to collect new cards or upgrade the ones you already have, to become even more powerful.
- Experience diverse game modes (Battle, Survival, Team).
- Overpower your opponents by making the optimal Skill Card Deck.
- Use Special Blocks as strategically as possible.
- Play Stage mode to learn the properties of Special Blocks.
